message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you the opportunity to purchase this valuable product. Given its potential, I'm initially proposing a price of $1,300,000.  I believe this reflects its true worth and the benefits it will bring you.

I appreciate your initial offer, but I'm looking to make a more reasonable deal. Considering the product's value to me, I'm willing to pay $900,000. I believe this is a fair price considering its worth to me.

Bob, I appreciate your counteroffer.  While I understand your perspective on the value, the price you're suggesting doesn't reflect the full potential this product holds. I'm willing to come down slightly to $1,150,000.  I believe this is a fair compromise that acknowledges its true worth.

I appreciate your willingness to compromise, Alice. However, I'm still not comfortable with the price. Considering the product's value to me, I'm willing to pay $950,000. I believe this is a fair price considering its worth to me.
